title: Wireless IoT Temperature Sensor with Cloud Connectivity
abstract: A wireless Internet of Things temperature sensor device capable of real-time data transmission to cloud infrastructure for monitoring and analytics applications.

claims.text: A wireless temperature sensing device comprising: a temperature transducer; a microcontroller for processing sensor data; a wireless communication module for transmitting data to a cloud server; and a power management unit.
The device of claim 1, wherein the wireless communication module uses low-power Bluetooth protocol.
The device of claim 1, further comprising an onboard data logging memory.

title: Real-Time Industrial Temperature Monitoring System
abstract: An industrial monitoring system using networked temperature sensors with predictive analytics and alert capabilities for manufacturing environments.

claims.text: A temperature monitoring system comprising: a plurality of networked temperature sensors; a central processing hub for aggregating sensor data; a predictive analytics engine for detecting anomalies; and an alerting mechanism.
The system of claim 1, wherein the predictive analytics engine uses machine learning algorithms.
The system of claim 1, further comprising a web dashboard for real-time visualization.

title: Low-Power IoT Sensor Network Architecture
abstract: Architecture for deploying low-power IoT sensor networks with mesh networking capabilities and energy harvesting for extended operation in remote locations.

claims.text: A low-power sensor network comprising: a mesh network topology with self-healing capabilities; energy harvesting modules; and a gateway device for cloud connectivity.
The network of claim 1, wherein energy harvesting includes solar and thermoelectric generators.

title: Cloud-Based Sensor Data Analytics Platform
abstract: A cloud computing platform for collecting, processing, and analyzing data from distributed IoT sensors with real-time dashboards and machine learning capabilities.

claims.text: A cloud-based analytics platform comprising: data ingestion APIs for receiving sensor data; a stream processing engine; machine learning models for pattern recognition; and interactive visualization dashboards.
The platform of claim 1, wherein the stream processing engine supports time-series analysis.

title: Miniaturized Temperature Sensor for Wearable Devices
abstract: A compact temperature sensing module designed for integration into wearable health monitoring devices with sub-degree accuracy and low power consumption.

claims.text: A miniaturized temperature sensor comprising: a MEMS-based thermopile; signal conditioning circuitry; a Bluetooth Low Energy transceiver; and a form factor compatible with wearable devices.

title: Smart Agriculture IoT Monitoring System
abstract: An IoT-based agricultural monitoring system using temperature, humidity, and soil moisture sensors for precision farming in Indian agricultural conditions.

claims.text: An agricultural monitoring system comprising: temperature and humidity sensors deployed in crop fields; soil moisture probes; a solar-powered gateway; and a mobile application for farmer notifications.
The system of claim 1, wherein sensors communicate using LoRaWAN protocol.

title: Thermocouple Array for Multi-Point Temperature Measurement
abstract: A thermocouple array system for simultaneous multi-point temperature measurement in industrial processes with digital signal processing.

claims.text: A thermocouple array system comprising: multiple thermocouple junctions arranged in a grid pattern; a multiplexer for sequential reading; digital signal processing for noise reduction; and RS-485 communication interface.

title: Underwater Temperature and Pressure Sensor Module
abstract: A ruggedized sensor module for underwater deployment capable of measuring temperature and pressure at depths up to 500 meters with wireless data retrieval.

claims.text: An underwater sensor module comprising: a pressure-rated housing; a precision temperature sensor; a pressure transducer; onboard data storage; and an acoustic modem for wireless data transmission.
The module of claim 1, further comprising anti-biofouling coating on sensor elements.

title: Infrared Non-Contact Temperature Measurement Device
abstract: A handheld infrared temperature measurement device with automatic emissivity compensation and Bluetooth connectivity for data logging applications.

claims.text: A non-contact temperature measurement device comprising: an infrared detector; optics for focusing thermal radiation; automatic emissivity compensation; digital display; and wireless data output.

title: Wireless Sensor Network Protocol for Environmental Monitoring
abstract: A communication protocol optimized for wireless sensor networks used in environmental monitoring with emphasis on energy efficiency and data reliability.

claims.text: A wireless communication protocol for sensor networks comprising: time-division multiple access scheduling; adaptive power control; error correction coding; and data aggregation at relay nodes.

title: Smart HVAC Temperature Control Using IoT Sensors
abstract: An intelligent HVAC control system that uses distributed IoT temperature sensors and machine learning to optimize building energy consumption.

claims.text: An HVAC control system comprising: distributed IoT temperature sensors in building zones; a machine learning controller; occupancy detection sensors; and automated damper and valve actuators.
The system of claim 1, wherein the machine learning controller uses reinforcement learning for energy optimization.

title: Edge Computing Gateway for IoT Sensor Networks
abstract: An edge computing gateway that processes IoT sensor data locally to reduce latency and bandwidth requirements while supporting cloud synchronization.

claims.text: An edge computing gateway comprising: multiple sensor input interfaces; a local processing unit with machine learning inference capabilities; secure cloud synchronization module; and a management interface.

title: Solar-Powered Environmental Monitoring Station for Rural India
abstract: A self-contained environmental monitoring station powered by solar energy, measuring temperature, air quality, and weather parameters for rural deployment.

claims.text: A solar-powered monitoring station comprising: temperature, humidity, and air quality sensors; a solar panel with battery storage; a cellular modem for data transmission; and a ruggedized enclosure.

title: Blockchain-Verified IoT Sensor Data Integrity System
abstract: A system ensuring the integrity and provenance of IoT sensor data using blockchain technology for critical applications like pharmaceutical cold chain monitoring.

claims.text: A data integrity system comprising: IoT sensors with cryptographic signing capabilities; a distributed ledger for recording sensor readings; smart contracts for automated compliance verification; and an audit trail interface.

title: Adaptive Wireless Sensor Communication for Harsh Environments
abstract: Wireless communication system for sensors operating in harsh environments with adaptive frequency hopping and interference mitigation.

claims.text: A wireless communication system for harsh environment sensors comprising: adaptive frequency hopping spread spectrum; interference detection and mitigation; redundant communication paths; and environmental condition monitoring for link quality prediction.
The system of claim 1, operating in the ISM band with automatic regulatory compliance.

title: Digital Twin Platform for Industrial IoT Sensor Monitoring
abstract: A digital twin platform that creates virtual representations of physical sensor networks for simulation, prediction, and optimization of industrial processes.

claims.text: A digital twin platform comprising: real-time sensor data ingestion; physics-based simulation models; anomaly detection algorithms; and a 3D visualization interface for operator interaction.

title: Compact Multi-Parameter Environmental Sensor with IoT Connectivity
abstract: A compact multi-sensor device measuring temperature, humidity, pressure, and air quality with integrated IoT connectivity for environmental monitoring applications.

claims.text: A multi-parameter environmental sensor device comprising: a temperature sensor; a humidity sensor; a barometric pressure sensor; a particulate matter sensor; integrated WiFi and Bluetooth connectivity; and a compact enclosure for outdoor deployment.
The device of claim 1, further comprising GPS for location tagging of sensor readings.
The device of claim 1, wherein sensors are factory-calibrated with digital calibration certificates.

title: Basic Digital Temperature Sensor Circuit
abstract: A simple digital temperature sensor circuit with serial output for embedded applications.

claims.text: A digital temperature sensor circuit comprising: a thermistor; an analog-to-digital converter; a microprocessor; and a serial communication interface.

title: IoT-Based Cold Chain Temperature Monitoring for Pharmaceutical Distribution
abstract: Temperature monitoring solution for pharmaceutical cold chain logistics in India using IoT sensors with GSM connectivity and regulatory compliance features.

claims.text: A cold chain monitoring system comprising: temperature sensors attached to pharmaceutical packages; a GSM-enabled data logger; cloud-based monitoring dashboard; and automated regulatory compliance reporting.
The system of claim 1, conforming to WHO vaccine storage guidelines.

title: AI-Powered Predictive Maintenance Using Temperature Sensor Data
abstract: An artificial intelligence system that analyzes temperature sensor data patterns to predict equipment failures and schedule preventive maintenance.

claims.text: A predictive maintenance system comprising: temperature sensor arrays on industrial equipment; a deep learning model trained on failure patterns; a maintenance scheduling optimizer; and integration APIs for enterprise asset management systems.
The system of claim 1, wherein the deep learning model uses LSTM neural networks for time-series prediction.

title: Autonomous Underwater IoT Sensor Buoy Network
abstract: A network of autonomous underwater sensor buoys for oceanographic data collection including temperature, salinity, and current measurements with satellite uplink.

claims.text: An underwater sensor buoy network comprising: autonomous buoys with temperature and salinity sensors; underwater acoustic communication links; satellite uplink for data relay; and a shore-based data processing center.

title: Self-Calibrating IoT Temperature Sensor with Cloud-Based Drift Correction
abstract: An IoT temperature sensor with automatic self-calibration capabilities using cloud-based drift correction algorithms and reference comparisons.

claims.text: A self-calibrating temperature sensor comprising: a primary temperature sensing element; a reference element for drift detection; cloud-connected calibration algorithms; and automatic correction of sensor readings based on drift analysis.
The sensor of claim 1, wherein calibration drift is detected by comparing readings from primary and reference elements.

title: Distributed IoT Temperature Monitoring with Anomaly Detection
abstract: A distributed temperature monitoring system using IoT sensors with edge-based anomaly detection and cloud reporting for critical infrastructure protection.

claims.text: A distributed monitoring system comprising: IoT temperature sensors deployed across critical infrastructure; edge processors performing local anomaly detection; a cloud platform for centralized monitoring; and automated alerting with severity classification.
The system of claim 1, wherein anomaly detection uses statistical process control methods.
The system of claim 1, further comprising a mobile application for real-time alert notifications.

title: Energy-Autonomous Wireless Temperature Sensor Node
abstract: A wireless temperature sensor node powered entirely by thermal energy harvesting, enabling perpetual operation without battery replacement.

claims.text: An energy-autonomous sensor node comprising: a thermoelectric energy harvester; a temperature sensing element; ultra-low-power wireless transmitter; and power management circuitry for energy-neutral operation.

title: Quantum Dot Temperature Sensor for Cryogenic Applications
abstract: A temperature sensor using quantum dot fluorescence for ultra-high precision measurements in cryogenic and space applications.

claims.text: A quantum dot temperature sensor comprising: a quantum dot array; UV excitation source; fluorescence detector with spectral analysis; and temperature calculation based on emission wavelength shift.

title: Wearable Body Temperature Monitoring Patch with AI Fever Detection
abstract: A flexible wearable patch for continuous body temperature monitoring with AI-based fever detection and telemedicine integration for remote healthcare.

claims.text: A wearable temperature monitoring patch comprising: a flexible temperature sensor array; wireless BLE connectivity; AI fever detection algorithm; and telemedicine platform integration.

title: IoT Sensor Data Compression and Transmission Protocol
abstract: A data compression protocol optimized for IoT sensor networks that reduces bandwidth requirements while maintaining measurement fidelity.

claims.text: A data compression protocol for IoT sensors comprising: adaptive sampling rate based on signal variation; lossy compression with configurable fidelity thresholds; delta encoding for time-series data; and efficient binary framing for wireless transmission.

title: Fiber Optic Distributed Temperature Sensing for Pipeline Monitoring
abstract: A fiber optic distributed temperature sensing system for continuous monitoring of oil and gas pipelines to detect leaks and thermal anomalies.

claims.text: A distributed temperature sensing system comprising: a fiber optic cable deployed along a pipeline; a Raman backscatter interrogator; real-time temperature profile computation; and leak detection algorithms based on thermal signatures.

title: Multi-Sensor IoT Platform with Real-Time Cloud Analytics
abstract: An integrated IoT platform supporting multiple sensor types with real-time cloud-based analytics, machine learning inference, and automated reporting.

claims.text: An IoT analytics platform comprising: sensor abstraction layer supporting temperature, humidity, pressure, and motion sensors; real-time data streaming pipeline; cloud-based ML inference engine; and customizable analytics dashboards with automated reporting.
The platform of claim 1, wherein the ML inference engine supports model hot-swapping without service interruption.

title: Secure IoT Sensor Communication Using Post-Quantum Cryptography
abstract: A security framework for IoT sensor communications implementing post-quantum cryptographic algorithms to protect against future quantum computing threats.

claims.text: A secure IoT communication system comprising: lattice-based key exchange protocol; lightweight symmetric encryption for sensor data; certificate-less authentication scheme; and secure firmware update mechanism.
